description: Held against his will, Cameron Kincade is fast asleep with his hands bound before the sting of the zapper abruptly wakes him up in a frenzy. Defiant, Cameron still refuses to submit, so he's then suspended in the air while medical forceps torment his nipples. A combination of merciless flogs and the clamps tearing away at his chest brings Cameron to submission as he begs for mercy. Strapped down and ass propped out, Jessie truly shows his domination by fucking his freshly broken slave and giving him a face full of cum.
title: The Submission of Cameron Kincade
